author: James D. Walsh
title: At Empty Bronx Zoo, Staff Use Social Distancing to Protect Gorillas
description: “Because some of our animals are so closely related to people, we have primate protocols in place all the time.”
content: Like businesses and government agencies in cities on lockdown across the country, the Bronx Zoo is working with a skeleton crew. To keep its animals well fed and maintain their environments but also, in some special cases, to make sure they are not exposed to… [+3240 chars]
